product_name: Outdoor Research Helios Sun Hat - Kids'
long_description: The Outdoor Research Helios sun hat shades the eyes, face and neck with an ample brim, and provides UPF 30 sun protection. Tasland polyester checkered fabric is lightweight yet tough; taped seams offer rain resistance. Headband wicks away excess moisture, helping skin stay dry, cool and comfortable. Foam-stiffened brim keeps the hat afloat in the water. The Outdoor Research Helios sun hat features a removable drawcord that ensures the hat remains in place on windy days.
short_description: The Outdoor Research Helios sun hat shades the eyes, face and neck with an ample brim, and provides UPF 30 sun protection.
